languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас глазами, полными нежности. На его лице появляется странная, почти ранимая улыбка.{/n} "Ты слишком милосердна и щедра к кому-то вроде меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас глазами, полными нежности. На его лице появляется странная, почти ранимая улыбка.{/n} "Ты слишком милосердна и щедра к кому-то вроде меня".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes full of tenderness. But a strange, almost wounded smile appears on his face.{/n} "You are too merciful and generous to someone like me."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас глазами, полными нежности. На его лице появляется странная, почти ранимая улыбка.{/n} "Ты слишком милосердна и щедра к кому-то вроде меня".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes full of tenderness. But a strange, almost wounded smile appears on his face.{/n} "You are too merciful and generous to someone like me."
{n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes full of tenderness. But a strange, almost wounded smile appears on his face.{/n} "You are too merciful and generous to someone like me."
{n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes full of tenderness. But a strange, almost wounded smile appears on his face.{/n} "You are too merciful and generous to someone like me."
{n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes full of tenderness. But a strange, almost wounded smile appears on his face.{/n} "You are too merciful and generous to someone like me."

languages.text: {n}海因里希看着你，眼神中充满了柔情，可他的脸上却露出了古怪、近乎受伤的微笑。{/n}“你对我这样的人太仁慈、太慷慨了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes full of tenderness. But a strange, almost wounded smile appears on his face.{/n} "You are too merciful and generous to someone like me."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看着你，眼神中充满了柔情，可他的脸上却露出了古怪、近乎受伤的微笑。{/n}“你对我这样的人太仁慈、太慷慨了。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira con ojos llenos de ternura. Una sonrisa extraña, casi herida, aflora en su cara.{/n} «Es demasiado compasiva y generosa con alguien como yo».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes full of tenderness. But a strange, almost wounded smile appears on his face.{/n} "You are too merciful and generous to someone like me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te mira con ojos llenos de ternura. Una sonrisa extraña, casi herida, aflora en su cara.{/n} «Es demasiado compasiva y generosa con alguien como yo».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスの目は優しさに満ちている。しかし、その顔には奇妙な、まるで傷ついたような笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}「あなたは俺のような者にあまりにも慈悲深く、寛大だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes full of tenderness. But a strange, almost wounded smile appears on his face.{/n} "You are too merciful and generous to someone like me."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスの目は優しさに満ちている。しかし、その顔には奇妙な、まるで傷ついたような笑みが浮かんでいる。{/n}「あなたは俺のような者にあまりにも慈悲深く、寛大だ」

languages.text: {n}Le sourire presque blessé que vous adresse Heinrix contraste avec son regard empli de tendresse.{/n} « Vous faites preuve de bien trop de clémence et de générosité à mon égard. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes full of tenderness. But a strange, almost wounded smile appears on his face.{/n} "You are too merciful and generous to someone like me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire presque blessé que vous adresse Heinrix contraste avec son regard empli de tendresse.{/n} « Vous faites preuve de bien trop de clémence et de générosité à mon égard. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix sieht dich an, sein Blick voller Zärtlichkeit. Dennoch zeigt sein Gesicht ein seltsames, fast schon schiefes Lächeln.{/n} "Ihr seid mir gegenüber viel zu gnädig und großzügig."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes full of tenderness. But a strange, almost wounded smile appears on his face.{/n} "You are too merciful and generous to someone like me."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix sieht dich an, sein Blick voller Zärtlichkeit. Dennoch zeigt sein Gesicht ein seltsames, fast schon schiefes Lächeln.{/n} "Ihr seid mir gegenüber viel zu gnädig und großzügig."

languages.text: {n}Gözleri şefkat dolu olan Heinrix, sana bakıyor. Sonrasında yüzünde tuhaf, âdeta yaralı bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Benim gibi birine karşı çok merhametli ve cömertsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you, his eyes full of tenderness. But a strange, almost wounded smile appears on his face.{/n} "You are too merciful and generous to someone like me."
